mapper.sql: vehiclecp, vehiclepp, vehiclexh, vehiclejsy, vehicledh, vehiclegs, vehiclefdj, vehiclefname, vehiclefdq, vehiclefcjh, vehicleffdjh, vehiclefzz, vehiclefrylb, vehiclefcx
mapper.select: SELECT vehicle.`vehiclecp`,brand.`brandname` AS vehiclepp ,motorcycle.`motorcyclecxmc` AS vehiclexh,vehicle.`vehiclejsy`,vehicle.`vehicledh`,`affiliation`.`affiliationname` AS vehiclegs,`engine`.`enginename` AS vehiclefdj, `client`.`clientname` AS vehiclefname ,vehicle.`vehiclefdq`,vehicle.`vehiclefcjh`,vehicle.`vehicleffdjh`,vehicle.`vehiclefzz`,vehicle.`vehiclefrylb`,vehicle.`vehiclefcx` FROM vehicle JOIN brand ON vehicle.`vehiclepp`=brand.`brandid` JOIN motorcycle ON motorcycle.`motorcyclepp`=vehicle.`vehiclexh` JOIN affiliation ON affiliation.`affiliationid`=vehicle.`vehiclegs` JOIN `engine` ON `engine`.`engineid` =vehicle.`vehiclefdj` JOIN `client` ON `client`.`clientid`=vehicle.`vehiclefname`

SELECT vehicle.`vehiclecp`,brand.`brandname` AS vehiclepp ,motorcycle.`motorcyclecxmc` AS vehiclexh,vehicle.`vehiclejsy`,vehicle.`vehicledh`,`affiliation`.`affiliationname` AS vehiclegs,`engine`.`enginename` AS vehiclefdj, `client`.`clientname` AS vehiclefname ,vehicle.`vehiclefdq`,vehicle.`vehiclefcjh`,vehicle.`vehicleffdjh`,vehicle.`vehiclefzz`,vehicle.`vehiclefrylb`,vehicle.`vehiclefcx` FROM vehicle JOIN brand ON vehicle.`vehiclepp`=brand.`brandid` JOIN motorcycle ON motorcycle.`motorcyclepp`=vehicle.`vehiclexh` JOIN affiliation ON affiliation.`affiliationid`=vehicle.`vehiclegs` JOIN `engine` ON `engine`.`engineid` =vehicle.`vehiclefdj` JOIN `client` ON `client`.`clientid`=vehicle.`vehiclefname` where vehicle.`vehiclecp`= #{vehiclecp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT vehicle.`vehiclecp`,brand.`brandname` AS vehiclepp ,motorcycle.`motorcyclecxmc` AS vehiclexh,vehicle.`vehiclejsy`,vehicle.`vehicledh`,`affiliation`.`affiliationname` AS vehiclegs,`engine`.`enginename` AS vehiclefdj, `client`.`clientname` AS vehiclefname ,vehicle.`vehiclefdq`,vehicle.`vehiclefcjh`,vehicle.`vehicleffdjh`,vehicle.`vehiclefzz`,vehicle.`vehiclefrylb`,vehicle.`vehiclefcx` FROM vehicle JOIN brand ON vehicle.`vehiclepp`=brand.`brandid` JOIN motorcycle ON motorcycle.`motorcyclepp`=vehicle.`vehiclexh` JOIN affiliation ON affiliation.`affiliationid`=vehicle.`vehiclegs` JOIN `engine` ON `engine`.`engineid` =vehicle.`vehiclefdj` JOIN `client` ON `client`.`clientid`=vehicle.`vehiclefname` WHERE vehiclefname= #{vehiclefname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into vehicle (vehiclecp, vehiclepp, vehiclexh, vehiclejsy, vehicledh, vehiclegs, vehiclefdj, vehiclefname, vehiclefdq, vehiclefcjh, vehicleffdjh, vehiclefzz, vehiclefrylb, vehiclefcx) values (#{vehiclecp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehiclepp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehiclexh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehiclejsy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehicledh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehiclegs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehiclefdj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehiclefname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehiclefdq,jdbcType=DATE}, #{vehiclefcjh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehicleffdjh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehiclefzz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehiclefrylb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehiclefcx,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into vehicle
vehiclecp,
vehiclepp,
vehiclexh,

vehicledh,
vehiclegs,

update vehicle set vehiclepp = #{vehiclepp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vehiclexh = #{vehiclexh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vehiclejsy = #{vehiclejsy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vehicledh = #{vehicledh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vehiclegs = #{vehiclegs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vehiclefdj = #{vehiclefdj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vehiclefname = #{vehiclefname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vehiclefdq = #{vehiclefdq,jdbcType=DATE}, vehiclefcjh = #{vehiclefcjh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vehicleffdjh = #{vehicleffdjh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vehiclefzz = #{vehiclefzz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vehiclefrylb = #{vehiclefrylb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vehiclefcx = #{vehiclefcx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where vehiclecp = #{vehiclecp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
